Docs.summary: Compares this instance to the supplied and returns an indication of their relative values.
Docs.returns:
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
Return value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object
-or-
The object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
Docs.related: SQL Server Data Types and ADO.NET

Docs.returns: A structure that contains the results of the bitwise XOR operation.
